title: PIXEL 4 bluetooth connection problems with car bluetooth
content:
I have a pixel 4 purchased over thanksgiving, started using around christmas, 

late january, my car (BMW428) infotainment system goes into reboot mode continuously,
i realized it was my phone causing the problem
upon few seconds bluetooth connection, the system will just just keep rebooting, connect, crash, repeat

i have contacted google, all they ask me to do is reset my wireless settings, which didn't resolve the problem
I have tried connecting with several other phones, Galaxy S8, iphone 8, iphone X, Pixel 2, Pixel 3
they all work just fine
google has actually sent me a refurbished phone as replacement, within the minute it connected, it started crashing the system again.

this is been frustrating as google cannot resolve my issue, and as i research online, this happens to multiple users, and also posted in this community, but it has been disabled for comments

Anyone else experience the same problem? any resolution?

I am wondering who is experiencing the same problem
